about_the_game:
In this game, you will have the chance to fulfill a dream many share — getting sex for free! But it won’t be as easy as it sounds. You’ll need wit, cunning, and charm, and sometimes, you may even have to put in some effort to achieve your goal while avoiding spending your hard-earned shekels.

  • Unique heroines. Try to impress the playful Vika, win over the mysterious Alina, and avoid embarrassing yourself in front of the statuesque Olga Ivanovna.

  • Diverse locations. You have plenty of options — the Museum, the Restaurant, and even the heroines’ Homes.

  • Exciting dates. Experiment with different approaches: prepare in advance or go with the flow, create spontaneous adventures, engage in philosophical conversations, or simply enjoy the moment.

content_descriptors.notes:
All the characters in the game are adults. 
The game features scenes of women in their underwear without interacting with them, erotic poses, erotic conversations, and rude speech. The game does not contain explicit sex scenes.

  • Unique heroines. Try to impress the playful Vika, win over the mysterious Alina, and avoid embarrassing yourself in front of the statuesque Olga Ivanovna.

name: Sex any cost but free

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Сore i3 / Ryzen 3
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1050 / RX 570
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 / 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 / Ryzen 5
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1060 / RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
